# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int m,n,a[101],b[101],dp[101][101];
		cin>>m;
		for(int i=0;i<m;i++) {cin>>a[i+1];}
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {cin>>b[i+1];}
		for(int i=0;i<=m;i++)
		{
			for(int j=0;j<=n;j++)
			{
				if(i==0 || j==0) dp[i][j] = max(i,j);
				else
				{
					if (a[i]==b[j]) dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];
					else
					{
						dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j]+1,dp[i][j-1]+1);
						dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j],dp[i-1][j-1]+1);
					}
				}
			}
		}
		cout<<dp[m][n]<<endl;
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
